title: Ravi Da
text: Azad Canteen , also known as Ravi Da's Canteen or simply Ravi Da , is the main canteen of Azad Hall of Residence . It usually opens in the evening around 9 pm and remains open till 2-3 am. Major employees of the canteen are Manoj, Praveen and Ajay, apart from the owner Mr. Ravi.
